backend_engineer.name: backend_engineer
backend_engineer.description: Technical interview for backend software engineering positions
questions: Tell me about yourself and your experience with backend development.
Explain the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases. When would you use each?
How do you handle API versioning in a production system?
Describe your approach to debugging a performance issue in a web service.
What strategies do you use to ensure your code is maintainable and scalable?
Explain how you would design a rate limiting system for an API.
Tell me about a time you had to optimize a slow database query. What was your approach?
How do you handle authentication and authorization in your applications?
What is your experience with microservices architecture? What are the trade-offs?
Describe how you would implement caching in a high-traffic application.

technical_knowledge.description: Understanding of backend concepts, databases, APIs, system design

communication.description: Ability to explain technical concepts clearly and concisely

sales_associate.name: sales_associate
sales_associate.description: Interview for sales and customer-facing positions
questions: Tell me about yourself and your experience in sales.
How do you approach building rapport with a new customer?
Describe a time when you successfully closed a difficult sale. What was your strategy?
How do you handle objections from potential customers?
What techniques do you use to identify customer needs?
Tell me about a time you failed to close a sale. What did you learn?
How do you stay motivated when facing rejection?
Describe your approach to following up with leads.
How do you prioritize your sales pipeline?
What metrics do you track to measure your sales performance?

technical_knowledge.description: Understanding of sales processes, techniques, and metrics

structure.description: Organization of thoughts and use of examples
key_areas: Use of STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result)

retail_associate.name: retail_associate
retail_associate.description: Interview for retail and customer service positions
questions: Tell me about yourself and why you're interested in retail.
How would you handle an upset customer who wants to return an item without a receipt?
Describe a time when you provided excellent customer service.
How do you handle multiple customers waiting for assistance at the same time?
What would you do if you noticed a coworker not following store policies?
How do you stay engaged during slow periods in the store?
Tell me about a time you had to learn about a new product quickly.
How would you handle a situation where a customer asks for a product you don't have in stock?
Describe your approach to maintaining a clean and organized store environment.
How do you balance helping customers with completing other store tasks?

communication.description: Customer service skills and interpersonal abilities

technical_knowledge.description: Understanding of retail operations and policies
